org.digitalertachograph.DDDQuery.internalData.Security
Class SecurityDataSignatureCheck

java.lang.Object
  org.digitalertachograph.DDDQuery.internalData.Security.SecurityDataSignatureCheck

public class SecurityDataSignatureCheck
extends java.lang.Object

Checks the integrity of data and its signature.

 void decipherSignature()
          Deciphers the ciphered signature of a DataSignature object set by setCipheredSignature(byte[]) with the RSA public key set by setRSAPublicKey(byte[], byte[]) or by setRSAPublicKey(String, String).

decipherSignature

public void decipherSignature()
Deciphers the ciphered signature of a DataSignature object set by setCipheredSignature(byte[]) with the RSA public key set by setRSAPublicKey(byte[], byte[]) or by setRSAPublicKey(String, String).

decipherSignature

public void decipherSignature(byte[] cipheredSignature)
Sets the supplied cipheredSignature for a DataSignatureCheck object and deciphers the signature with the RSA public key set by setRSAPublicKey(byte[], byte[]) or by setRSAPublicKey(String, String).

Parameters:
cipheredSignature - the ciphered signature to be set for the DataSignatureCheck object and to be deciphered

getDecipheredSignatureByteArray

public byte[] getDecipheredSignatureByteArray()
Returns the deciphered signature that was deciphered by decipherSignature() or decipherSignature(byte[]) as byte array.

Returns:
the deciphered signature of the DataSignatureCheck object as byte array

getDecipheredSignatureHexString

public java.lang.String getDecipheredSignatureHexString()
Returns the deciphered signature that was deciphered by decipherSignature() or decipherSignature(byte[]) as hex string.

Returns:
the deciphered signature of the DataSignatureCheck object as hex string

isValidData

public boolean isValidData()
Indicates if the data integrity check was successful and the data is valid.
The data integrity check is done internally by comparing the data's SHA1 hash with the SHA1 hash supplied by the deciphered signature.

Returns:
true if the data's integrity could be successfully verified and the validity of the data is proved.
